errors.ERR_01: One of the required fields is missing!
errors.ERR_02: The length of the e-mail address exceeds 255 characters!
errors.ERR_03: The length of the personal name exceeds 255 characters!
errors.ERR_04: The length of the name exceeds 255 characters!
errors.ERR_05: The length of the phone number exceeds 32 characters!
errors.ERR_08: The password must be at least 8 characters long!
errors.ERR_09: The password confirmation written does not match with the written password!
errors.ERR_11: A user with such e-mail address already exists in the system. Please, use a different e-mail address!
errors.ERR_13: This user is blocked and can't use this system. Please, contact the system's technical support team!
errors.ERR_14: You don't have the permission to access this resource!
errors.ERR_15: You don't have the permission to do this action!
errors.ERR_16: Only company's {{ name }} managers can access this resource. Please, contact this company's manager!
errors.ERR_17: Only team's {{ name }} members can access this resource. Please, contact this team's manager!
errors.ERR_18: Sadly, there is an error during the processing of this request. Please, try again later!
errors.ERR_20: There is such relationship entry in the system already!

success.SUC_01: The user has logged in successfully!
success.SUC_03: The change of user's data saved successfully!
success.SUC_06: The user was deleted from the system successfully!
success.SUC_07: The creation of a company was completed successfully!
success.SUC_08: The change of company's data saved successfully!
success.SUC_11: The company was deleted from the system successfully!
success.SUC_12: The creation of a team was completed successfully!
success.SUC_13: The change of team's data saved successfully!
success.SUC_14: The role of the user was changed successfully!
success.SUC_15: The team was deleted from the system successfully!
success.SUC_16: The creation of a task was completed successfully!
success.SUC_17: The change of task's data saved successfully!
success.SUC_18: The task was deleted from the system successfully!

confirm.CON_01: Do you want to delete yourself from the system? All user data will be deleted! This action cannot be undone!
confirm.CON_02: Do you want to delete the user {{ user }} from the system? All data of this user will be deleted! This action cannot be undone!
confirm.CON_03: Do you want to block the user {{ user }}? The user will no longer be able to access the system if you proceed.
confirm.CON_04: Do you want to unblock the user {{ user }}? The user will be able to access the system if you proceed.
confirm.CON_05: Do you want to delete the company {{ name }} from the system? All data of this company will be deleted! This action cannot be undone.
confirm.CON_06: Do you want to add the user {{ user }} to the company {{ company }} as its manager? The user will be able to access the company's resources if you proceed.
confirm.CON_07: Do you want to remove the manager role of the user {{ user }} in this company? The user will no longer have access to its resources if you proceed.
confirm.CON_08: Do you want to delete the team {{ name }} from the list of teams in the company {{ company }}? All team data will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
confirm.CON_09: Do you want to add the user {{ user }} to this team? The user will be able to access the team's resources if you proceed.
confirm.CON_10: Do you want to remove the user {{ user }} from this team? The user will no longer be able to access the team's resources if you proceed.
confirm.CON_11: Do you want to change the role of the user {{ user }} in the team to manager? The user will be able to perform all actions related to creating, editing, and deleting team tasks if you proceed.
confirm.CON_12: Do you want to change the role of the user {{ user }} in the team to member? The user will no longer manage tasks but will still be able to view them if you proceed.
confirm.CON_13: Do you want to delete this task? All task data will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

index.headline: Add task management to your own workflow
index.headlinetext: Designed for personal and business use!

register_ui.headline: Sign up to TaskApp
register_ui.phoneformat: Phone number format - +XXX00000000 without any spaces.
register_ui.passformat: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

team.add_to_team_prompt: Enter the new member's e-mail address
